short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: SaySync is a bridge between Pipedrive and your communication channels. SaySync offers a Chrome extension and an Outlook add-in.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance your productivity and streamline your sales processes. Through direct integration with Outlook, Gmail, LinkedIn, WhatsApp, and Telegram, this tool allows you to easily manage your Pipedrive contacts, organizations, deals, activities, and notes - all without ever leaving your communication channel.

Key Features:
➤ Quickly add new Pipedrive contacts, organizations, deals, activities, and notes
➤ View essential Pipedrive information at a glance
➤ Update stage and status of your Pipedrive deals
